name: RainyMood
0:
”Alexa open rainy mood”
”Alexa ask rainy mood to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rainy mood
des:
Enhance your sleep and focus with Rainy Mood! The soft pitter patter of rain invokes the most calming rainy mood to help you fall asleep quickly. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Rainy Mood, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
